SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.medication

Element DoseAmount

Documentation:
The amount of medication taken per dose, as a quantity or range.
Ancestors:
  • DoseAmount
Used By:

  • ImmunizationAction, 
  • ImmunizationGiven, 
  • ImmunizationNotGiven, 
  • ImmunizationRequested, 
  • ImmunizationRequestedAgainst
